tools.name: alignment-cleaner.mjs
tools.description:
* Alignment Cleaner
 * Safely fixes misaligned content based on alignment detection
 * 
 * Fixes:
 * - Flattened work (restores 3D depth)
 * - Pages that look bad (upgrades to museum-grade)
 * - Content that sounds lame (makes it authentic and inspiring)
 * - Flat/boxy patterns (replaces with immersive 3D)
 * 
 * @license CC0-1.0 - Public Domain

tools.name: app-completion-research.mjs
tools.description:
* @author Rebecca Respawn
 * @license CC0-1.0 - Public Domain
 * 
 * App Completion Research Tool
 * Scans all apps across all repos (local and remote) to identify:
 * - Split apps: Apps with code/files scattered across multiple locations
 * - Lost apps: Apps referenced but missing or incomplete
 * - Code issues: Large files, complex functions, missing error handling
 * - Format issues: Inconsistent formatting, mixed styles
 * - Style issues: Inconsistent naming, missing documentation
 * - Completion issues: Missing dependencies, incomplete features, broken builds
 * 
 * Best Practices Applied:
 * - Comprehensive error handling with try-catch
 * - Well-documented with JSDoc
 * - Strong type definitions where applicable
 * - Performance optimization with efficient file scanning
 * - Input validation for file operations

apps.name: @cathedral/web
apps.description: Cathedral Web Interface - 3D Open World Experience

apps.name: cathedral-of-circuits
apps.description: Lightweight sacred technology monorepo - runs entirely on free hosting

scripts.clean: turbo run clean && rm -rf node_modules .turbo dist

apps.name: @cathedral/professional-design-suite
apps.description: Professional-grade open source design suite with sacred geometry precision - Adobe/Figma replacement

apps.name: @cathedral/cathedral-unity
apps.description: Cathedral Unity - Professional Creative Technology Platform

apps.name: @cathedral/circuitum99
apps.description: Circuitum 99: Alpha et Omega - The Canonical Living Arcana Deployment

scripts.deploy: npm run build && echo 'Circuitum 99 ready for deployment!'

apps.name: @cathedral/cosmogenesis-learning-engine
apps.description: Cosmogenesis Learning Engine - AI-powered mystical education with sacred geometry and gem tower integration

apps.name: @bekalah/cathedral-monorepo
apps.description: Cathedral of Circuits - Living Grimoire Engine with 22 Tradition Masters & Fusion Kink

scripts.legacy-build: pnpm -C packages/data build && pnpm run build:packages && pnpm -C apps/web build
scripts.build:packages: tsc -b packages/brain packages/soul packages/labs packages/shared packages/crystals packages/synth
scripts.alpha-omega: echo '🎨 Opening Alpha et Omega visualization...' && open circuitum99-alpha-et-omega.html
scripts.99-gates: pnpm -C packages/circuitum99 alpha && pnpm -C packages/circuitum99 mystery && pnpm -C packages/circuitum99 omega
scripts.ecosystem-health: pnpm run validate-datasets && echo '🎉 All mystical systems healthy!'
scripts.failcheck: pnpm run check-integrity || echo '❌ Issues found - check dashboard for details'

apps.name: @cathedral/liber-arcanae-app
apps.description: 22 Living Tarot - Hermetic RPG Interface

apps.name: @bekalah/liber-arcanae-tarot
apps.description: 🃏 Liber Arcanae Tarot - Living Major Arcana App with Interactive Readings & Sacred Art

apps.name: @cathedral/magical-mystery-house
apps.description: Magical Mystery House - Mystical adventure game with sacred geometry and infinite exploration

apps.name: @cathedral/mystical-treasure-hunt
apps.description: Real-world mystical treasure hunt game with visionary art realms, arcana-specific missions, and permanent knowledge registry

scripts.test:ci: pnpm -w bundle && pnpm --filter @cathedral/vscode-webview build && pnpm test:run
scripts.test:run: rimraf out && tsc -p tsconfig.json && npx dotenvx run -f .env.local -- node ./out/runTest.js

apps.name: @cathedral/vscode-nightly
apps.description: Nightly build for the Roo Code VSCode extension.

scripts.vsix:nightly: cd build && mkdirp ../../../bin && npx vsce package --no-dependencies --out ../../../bin

apps.name: @bekalah/cathedral-web
apps.description: 🏰 Cathedral Main Interface: Trinity + Tarot Integration with Three.js, Babylon.js & Sacred Art

scripts.build:export: next build && next export || next build
